name: mywire
overview:
MyWire syndicates editorial content from hundreds of publications around the world, providing content across genres, across formats (articles, slideshows, audio, video and interactive), and across pay types (free and paid). In addition, the company facilitates the creation of new forms of professionally generated content to further enrich the consumer experience.

MyWire has developed a suite of SmartServices that enables websites, asset providers and publications to participate in a content marketplace. The MyWire content network displays current, relevant content abstracts on participating websites and drives low cost, targeted traffic to publishers. The MyWire publishing platform facilitates the creation of digital media and its delivery across multiple venues (internet, mobile, TV). The platform connects owners of images, video and other media assets with publishers, to enable the creation of new, mashup-rich publications.

MyWire’s Tenpedia is one such professionally created publication which presents ten-minute takes in multimedia. Each entry consists of a concise set of significant photos from the worldâ€™s leading photography archives and a complementary narrative created by a recognized expert on the subject of the entry.
